html:
{% set created=frappe.db.get_value("User",doc.owner,"first_name")%}

PRE MR
{{doc.name}}

WTT INTERNATIONAL PVT LTD

No.3, College Cross Road, Avarankadu,
Tirupur-641 602, Tamilnadu, India.
Email : info@wttint.com
Web : www.wttint.com








{%- for row in doc.combo_table -%} {%- endfor -%}
PRE MR NO: {{ doc.name }}
PRE MR DATE: {{ doc.get_formatted ("posting_date")}}
REQUIRED DATE: {{ doc.get_formatted ("required_by")}}
PROJECT: {{ doc.project }}
CREATED BY: {{created}}
PURPOSE: {{doc.purpose}}
S.NO DESCRIPTION TECHNICAL DESCRIPTION QTY UOM REMARKS DRAWING NO
{% if row.idx %}{{ row.idx}}{% endif %} {% if row.description %}{{ row.description}}{% endif %} {% if row.technical_description %}{% for var in row.technical_description.split(",") %}{{ var }}
{% endfor %}{% endif %}		 {% if row.qty %}{{ row.qty}}{% endif %} {% if row.uom %}{{ row.uom}} {% endif %} {% if row.remarks %}{{ row.remarks }}{% endif %} {% if row.drawing_no %}{{ row.drawing_no }}{% endif %}
name: PRE MR Format
